name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bionic Reader - ADHD Aid For Reading

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that makes text on web pages easier to read using bionic reading techniques.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reading just became easier. I'm a 15 year old developer and this extension is to aid people to read faster, clearer, and more efficiently. Give it a shot, leave me feedback and I would love to incorporate anything you suggest.
